headline: IBM Informs Staff of DEI Retreat as Trump-Era Scrutiny Grows

headline: Silicon Motion (SIMO) Moves 8.7% Higher: Will This Strength Last?
summary: Silicon Motion (SIMO) was a big mover last session on higher-than-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might not help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.
